features.name: Admin Dashboard
features.description: Real-time metrics dashboard for wine club management with member distribution, plan analytics, and revenue tracking

features.name: Member Management
features.description: Complete member lifecycle management with Square customer sync, plan assignment, and member directory

features.name: Plan Management
features.description: Subscription plan creation and management with Square customer group integration

features.name: Club Setup Wizard
features.description: Multi-step wizard for Square integration, preferences, inventory, and shipping configuration

features.name: Customer Preferences
features.description: Global preferences management and custom shipment builder for member-specific wine assignments

features.name: Shipment Builder
features.description: Create shipments, assign wines to member preferences, and manage shipping schedules

features.name: Fulfillment Workflow
features.description: Multi-step order fulfillment from Square orders to shipping with CSV export and tracking upload

features.name: Marketing Integration
features.description: Email campaigns and member communication tools

features.name: Embeddable Signup Widget
features.description: Embeddable signup form for Square websites with plan selection and wine preview

features.name: Customer Wine Selection
features.description: Interactive wine selection process with swapping, filtering, and preference management

features.name: Bonus Upsell
features.description: Additional wine upsell functionality for customers

features.name: Delivery Date Confirmation
features.description: Customer delivery date selection and confirmation

features.name: Payment Collection
features.description: Secure payment processing and method management for customers

features.name: SaaS Admin Dashboard
features.description: Platform management dashboard for SaaS administrators with multi-club oversight

features.name: Organizations Management
features.description: Manage all wine clubs and their metrics from SaaS admin portal

features.name: Users Management
features.description: Create and manage admin users across all wine clubs

features.name: Billing Management
features.description: Stripe integration for platform subscription management

features.name: Authentication System
features.description: Supabase Auth integration with magic links, verification, and multi-tenant support

features.name: Multi-tenant Context
features.description: ClientContext for managing wine club state and multi-tenant data isolation

features.name: API Integration Layer
features.description: Comprehensive API layer for Supabase and Square API integration with direct client calls

features.name: Supabase Edge Functions
features.description: Backend Edge Functions for Square API integration, email services, and complex operations

features.name: UI Component Library
features.description: Comprehensive Shadcn/ui component library with custom components

features.name: Admin Layout
features.description: Responsive admin layout with sidebar navigation and multi-tenant support

features.name: Superadmin Layout
features.description: SaaS admin layout for platform management
